<div id="fb-root"></div>
<button class="btn btn-primary" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#login-menu">請選擇登入的服務</button>

登入後，會將您的追蹤紀錄顯示於下方。

<div id="login-menu" class="modal fade in" tabindex="-1" role="dialog" aria-hidden="true" style="display: none;">
  <div class="modal-header">
    <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-hidden="true">×</button>
  </div>
  <div class="modal-body">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-8" style="border-right: 1px dotted #C2C2C2;padding-right: 30px;">
        <ul class="thumbnails" style="text-align: center; font-size: 200%">
          <li class="span3">
            <a class="thumbnail" href="#">
              <div id="google-signin"></div>
            </a>
          </li>
          <li class="span3">
            <a class="thumbnail" href="#">
              <div class="fb-login-button" data-max-rows="2" data-size="xlarge" data-show-faces="false" data-auto-logout-link="false"></div>
            </a>
          </li>
          <li class="span3">
            <!-- <button class="btn btn-primary" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#login-menu">請選擇登入的服務</button> -->
            <a class="thumbnail" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#classroom-login">
              <img alt="Classroom登入" style="width: 240px; height: 50px; line-height: 50px;" src=""/>
            </a>
          </li>
          <li class="span3">
            <a class="thumbnail" href="#", onClick="return datascienceandrLogout();"><img alt="登出" style="width: 240px; height: 50px; text-align: center; line-height: 50px;" src=""/></a>
          </li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<div id="classroom-login" class="modal fade in" tabindex="-2" role="dialog" aria-hidden="true" style="display: none;">
  <div class="modal-header">
    <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-hidden="true">×</button>
  </div>
  <div class="modal-content">
    <div style="width: 66.66666667%">
			<form class="form-horizontal">
					<div class="control-group">
						<label class="control-label" for="account">帳號名稱</label>
						<div class="controls">
							<input id="account" type="text" required/>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="control-group">
						<label class="control-label" for="password">密碼</label>
						<div class="controls">
							<input id="password" type="password" required/>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="control-group">
						<div class="controls">
							<input value="Login" class="btn btn-primary" type="submit">
							<!-- <a id="forgotPasswordLink" href="#">Forgot Password</a> -->
						</div>
					</div>
			</form>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<table id="datascienceandr_user_records" class="display">
</table>
